posts.post_content: search for a [boggart shenanigans](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=boggart shenanigans), [skirk drill sergeant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=skirk drill sergeant), [skirk prospector](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=skirk prospector), [siege-gang commander](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=siege-gang commander), and four [mogg war marshal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=mogg war marshal)s in that order. Draw and play the first two. When you play the [skirk prospector](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=skirk prospector), sacrifice [goblin recruiter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=goblin recruiter) for a red, then tap two more mana to activate [skirk drill sergeant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=skirk drill sergeant) to get [siege-gang commander](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=siege-gang commander). Sacrifice the three goblins that come into play to do it again for the [mogg war marshal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=mogg war marshal). Then you can sacrifice [mogg war marshal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=mogg war marshal) and the two other goblins you get to do it again (do this for all the [mogg war marshal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=mogg war marshal)s. When you've used all four of them, you're opponent would be at 4 from the [boggart shenanigans](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=boggart shenanigans). Sacrifice [skirk drill sergeant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=skirk drill sergeant) and [skirk prospector](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=skirk prospector)... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
search for a boggart shenanigans, skirk drill sergeant, skirk prospector, siege-gang commander, and four mogg war marshals in that order. Draw and play the first two. When you play the skirk prospector, sacrifice goblin recruiter for a red, then tap two more mana to activate skirk drill sergeant to get siege-gang commander. Sacrifice the three goblins that come into play to do it again for the mogg war marshal. Then you can sacrifice mogg war marshal and the two other goblins you get to do it again (do this for all the mogg war marshals. When you've used all four of them, you're opponent would be at 4 from the boggart shenanigans. Sacrifice skirk drill sergeant and skirk prospector... (see all)
